note: These example inputs are designed to return topics reliably with the current retrieval implementation (EU Search API text parameter). The key is to use plain, broad terms (no quotes, no AND) like programme acronyms/codes.

end_to_end_examples.name: Robotics SME (broad) - should return many topics

company.name: Danube Robotics SRL
company.description: We build robotics and automation solutions for logistics and manufacturing, including autonomous mobile robots, fleet management software, and safety-certified integration.

end_to_end_examples.why_it_works: Retrieval hits on plain programme terms + common tech keywords; avoids quoted boolean syntax that yields 0 results.
